base_description: Rectangular, gray, modern cabinet with compartments.
part_description: Four compartments on top, large front panel below; rectangular shapes, evenly spaced, occupying upper half.
internal_interaction_description: The compartments on top are separated by vertical dividers, allowing distinct storage spaces. The large front panel may open or slide to reveal additional storage space behind it, providing a seamless design. The arrangement facilitates organized storage, with the top compartments suitable for smaller items.
external_interaction_description: The cabinet can be placed against a wall in a room, serving as storage or display. Its modern design complements contemporary interiors. The compartments can hold objects like books or decorative items, while the large panel may conceal larger items, enhancing room aesthetics and functionality.
